alert.note: Alert for Washoe (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 4:33PM PDT until August 04 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of western Nevada, including the following county, Washoe. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 433 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Reno, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Cold Springs, Cold Springs Valley, Stead, Lemmon Valley, Golden Valley, Verdi-Mogul, Dogskin Mountain, Stead Airport and Sun Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
